acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped integer values with @PodamIntValue annotation
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleIntegerValues

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.IntegerValuePojo
Then the Object should not be null
Then the integer field should be greater or equal to zero
Then the integer field 28 should have a value not greater than 100
Then the integer field 354 should have a value between 0 and 1000
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field should be greater or equal to zero
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 12 should have a value not greater than 100
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 214 should have a value between 0 and 1000
Then the integer field 145241 should have the precise value of 145241
Then the integer field should not be null
Then the integer field 145241 should have the precise value of 145241
